entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are described as creatures that went for the boys and made everything go cold.

entities.name: madam bones
entities.description: Madam Bones is a person who has red marks under her eyebrow where the monocle had dug into it.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as one of the boys who tried to repel the dementor and eventually produced a Patronus.

entities.name: mrs. figg
entities.description: Mrs. Figg is a person who felt the presence of the dementors and described what happened to Harry.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: A Patronus is a magical being that was produced by Harry and chased away the second dementor.

relationships.description: Harry produced a Patronus which charged down the first dementor and then chased away the second from his cousin.
The dementors went for the boys, one of them had fallen and Harry was backing away trying to repel the dementor.
